recipes.name: Miso-Glazed Salmon
recipes.ingredients: 4 salmon fillets,3 tablespoons white miso,3 tablespoons mirin,3 tablespoons sake,1 tablespoon sugar,1 teaspoon grated ginger,1 teaspoon grated garlic,1 tablespoon vegetable oil
recipes.cooking_method:
1. Preheat the broiler. 
2. In a bowl, mix together the miso, mirin, sake, sugar, ginger, and garlic. 
3. Brush the salmon fillets with the miso mixture. 
4. Place the salmon fillets on a baking sheet and broil for 8-10 minutes, or until the salmon is cooked through.

recipes.name: Chicken Teriyaki
recipes.ingredients: 4 boneless, skinless chicken breasts,1/4 cup soy sauce,1/4 cup mirin,1/4 cup sake,2 tablespoons sugar,1 tablespoon vegetable oil,1 tablespoon grated ginger,1 tablespoon grated garlic
recipes.cooking_method:
1. In a bowl, whisk together the soy sauce, mirin, sake, sugar, ginger, and garlic. 
2. Place the chicken breasts in a large resealable plastic bag and pour the marinade over the chicken. 
3. freeze it at least 2 hours, or overnight. 
4. Heat the vegetable oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. 
5. Remove the chicken from the marinade and discard the marinade. 
6. Cook the chicken in the skillet for 5-6 minutes per side, or until cooked through.

recipes.name: Beef Udon Noodle Soup
recipes.ingredients: 1 pound flank steak, sliced thinly,8 ounces udon noodles,6 cups chicken or beef broth,2 tablespoons soy sauce,1 tablespoon mirin,1 tablespoon sake,1 tablespoon vegetable oil,1 tablespoon grated ginger
recipes.cooking_method:
1. Cook the udon noodles according to package instructions. 
2. In a large pot, heat the vegetable oil over medium-high heat. 
3. Add the sliced flank steak and cook for 2-3 minutes, or until browned. 
4. Add the ginger and garlic and cook for another minute. 
5. Add the broth, soy sauce, mirin, and sake. 
6. Bring the soup to a simmer and cook for 10-15 minutes, or until the beef is cooked through. 
7. Add the cooked udon noodles like ramen. 
8. Serve the soup hot, garnished with sliced green onions.

recipes.name: Tempura
recipes.ingredients: Shrimp or vegetables,3Egg,3 tablespoons mirin,Water,1 tablespoon sugar,Oil,1 teaspoon grated garlic,Flour
recipes.cooking_method: Dip the shrimp or vegetables in a batter made of flour, egg, and water, and deep-fry them in hot oil until crispy.

recipes.name: Sushi
recipes.ingredients: Sushi rice,Nori (seaweed),Raw fish or seafood,Wasabi,Soy sauce
recipes.cooking_method: Cook the sushi rice, spread it on the nori, add raw fish or seafood, and roll it up tightly. Slice and serve with wasabi and soy sauce.

recipes.name: Beef Udon Noodle Soup
recipes.ingredients: 1 pound flank steak, sliced thinly,8 ounces udon noodles,6 cups chicken or beef broth,2 tablespoons soy sauce,1 tablespoon mirin,1 tablespoon sake,1 tablespoon vegetable oil,1 tablespoon grated ginger
recipes.cooking_method:
1. Cook the udon noodles according to package instructions. 
2. In a large pot, heat the vegetable oil over medium-high heat. 
3. Add the sliced flank steak and cook for 2-3 minutes, or until browned. 
4. Add the ginger and garlic and cook for another minute. 
5. Add the broth, soy sauce, mirin, and sake. 
6. Bring the soup to a simmer and cook for 10-15 minutes, or until the beef is cooked through. 
7. Add the cooked udon noodles to the pot and stir to combine. 
8. Serve the soup hot, garnished with sliced green onions.

recipes.name: Ramen
recipes.ingredients: Ramen noodles,Pork broth,3 tablespoons mirin,3 tablespoons sake,1 tablespoon sugar,1 teaspoon grated ginger,Green onions,Chashu pork
recipes.cooking_method: 1. Boil the ramen noodles according to package instructions. 2. Heat the pork or chicken broth in a separate pot. 3. Cook the pork belly or chicken breast and set aside. 4. Cut the green onions and nori seaweed into small pieces. 5. Soft-boil an egg. 6. In a bowl, add the cooked ramen noodles, broth, pork belly or chicken breast, green onions, bean sprouts, nori seaweed, and the soft-boiled egg. Serve hot.
